agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Health & Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 23, 2019 PLACE: Senate Chamber CHAIR: Senator Lois Kolkhorst To consider the following: HB 1218 Klick | et al. SP: Perry Relating to the distribution of benefits under the supplemental nutrition assistance program. HB 2255 Darby | et al. SP: Johnson Relating to newborn and infant hearing screening results and the provision of information following a screening. SB 121 West Relating to the adoption of cats and dogs previously used for research. SB 329 Seliger | et al. Relating to requirements for and the transparency of epidemiological reports and certain immunization exemption information and reports. SB 1404 Powell Relating to an electronic portal for disclosures and consent regarding certain newborn screening information. SB 1458 Johnson | et al. Relating to compliance with federal coding guidelines for certain divisions and offices within the Health and Human Services Commission. SB 1543 Menéndez Relating to providing notice of the right to record Department of Family and Protective Services investigative interviews. SB 2351 Hall Relating to discrimination by a health care provider based on immunization status. Pending business Oral and written testimony: fill out a paper witness card and hold on to your documents until your name is called to the table. Position only: register using the Senate kiosk located in the extension hallways or by going to Http://swrs on public-capitol. Written testimony only: register your position using the Senate kiosk then bring your 20 copies, with your name on each copy, to the Assistant Clerk, during the hearing. Public oral testimony will be limited to 2 minutes Bills deleted after last posting: HB 1256 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
